topics.body: Not a big fan of touhou but I must say I like Alstroemeria Records, for some reason their music is just so soothing but upbeat at the same time; it's kind of like emo music for people that aren't emo. I'm very upset and devastated right now and just want to throw a chair through a wall right now and I have been listening to "this":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e0pp2ebXT9k over and over because the lyrics describe how I feel right now-heartbroken and hopeless, for some reason it's just so calming and comforting, it's the equivalent of a woman eating chocolate ice cream after a tough breakup.
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e

topics.body:
Remember the Discussion about Why Mecha Could never exist, And I said that valkyries were the most plausible mecha? I completely forgot about a Mecha that's more realistic

!http://www.mahq.net/mecha/votoms/atvotoms/atm-09-st.jpg!
The Armored troopers from Armored trooper votoms

They only use Ballistic weaponry, They're incredibly fragile, While they can walk, They more often glide around on some sort of Rocket skates

And They usually only have about Two weapons tops
